attributes.action: give mobile homes the same recognition under council tax legislation as freehold and leasehold. To scrap the practice of valueing the home and pitch seperately and adding them together to set a council tax band.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The practice of seperating home and land for valuation puts a higher value on the home than that required under the legislation, and has done so since 1993.
